title: PearLyrics .6.3
description:
The fantastic Pear Lyrics for Mac OS X. This program will automatically scour the Internet for lyrics to the songs in your iTunes library and automatically add them to the "lyrics" tab. How cool is that?

Read about what happened to this great software here: http://www.pearworks.com/pages/pearLyrics.html

NOTE: This is the new, updated version. The changes from version .6 include:
- new copyright notification message upon the first launch
- Universal binary for PowerPC and Intel processors
- Updated lyrics site parsers


Share and Enjoy!
